Translations.Text: Alo. Wigi d issekniyen n Tazmamt ipbegginen
Ih, Nessader it id d Leqwoan, s taaoabt, amar a pfehmem
Nekwni Neekku yak tiekayin igerzen mavi, deg wayen i k Nweeea di Leqwoan agi, xas telliv, uqbel is, seg wid istehzan
Mi inna Yusef i baba s: "a baba! Nek wala$ mrawyan itran, iiij, akked waggur, wala$ ten knan iyi
Inna: "a mmi! Ur eekku ayen twalav i watmaten ik, ad ak andin ticeokep. Cciian, s tidep, d acengu n uuee n umdan
Akka, a k Ifren Mass ik, u ak Isselmed asefru n temsal, u ad Itim l$it iS, i kecc akked twacult n Yaaqub, akken it Itam, zik, af lejdud ik: Iboahim akked Iseaq. Mass ik, s tidep, d Amusnaw, d Uuwib
Ni$, di Yusef akked watma s, illa ussekni i wid isteqsayen
Mi nnan: "war ccekk, ifen a$, Yusef akked gma s, akken iten ieemmel babat nne$, u nekwni d iieoma. Babat nne$, s tidep, haat di ttelfan n uuee
En$et Yusef, ne$ nfut ep si tmurt, a d ilhu degwen babat wen, sinna, a ppu$alem d imdanen ixeddmen ayen ilhan
Inna win d immeslayen, degsen: "ur neqqet Yusef, veggoet ep ar lqaaa n wannu. Ma tgam akka, a t iddem yiwen umsebrid
Nnan: "a babat nne$, acu k iu$en, ur a$ tuminev ara, $ef Yusef. Nekwni, fellas, s tidep, d unuieen
Sseddu t yidne$ azekka, ad izhu, ad iurar. Nekwni, war ccekk, a neareb fellas
Inna: "nek, s tidep, $weble$ ma tebbwim t yidwen, ugade$ a t icc lweec, kunwi testehzam degs
Nnan: "ma icca t lweec, u nekwni d iieoma, s tidep a nili d imexsuoen
Mi t bbwin, mwafaqen a t roen ar lqaaa n wannu, Nweeea yas: "ad asen temlev, s tidep, lameo agi nnsen, nitni ur eoin
U$alen d tameddit, ar babat sen, pprun
Nnan: "a babat nne$, s tidep, noue a nemzizzel, neooa Yusef ar lqecc nne$, icca t lweec. Ur a$ teppamnev, xas nenna d tidep
Bbwin d tasedrit is, degs idamen n rrya. Inna: "xaii! D iman nnwen i wen d iccacven lameo. Ilha uubeo. Anuju $eo Oebbi, mgal ayen d teekam
Usan d iminigen, uznen win id ippagwmen, issader ssvel is. Inna: "a lxio, wagi d aqcic"! Ffren t, amzun d sselaa. Oebbi Ieoa acu xeddmen
Zzenzen t, s ooxa, s kra iuuodiyen. Ur as fkin ara azal

Inna, i tmeiiut is, Umauoi i t iu$en: "eoeeb yis, amar ad a$ infaa, at nerr d mmit nne$". Akka ay Nesseqaad Yusef di tmurt, iwakken ad as Nesseefev asefru n temsal. Oebbi d Amezwaru s lameo iS, maca tegwti n medden ur eoin ara
Mi d immeetel, Nefka yas uuwab, tussna. Akka ay Nepkafi iaaoviyen
Teb$a t tin u$ur izde$. Terra tibbura, u tenna: "eyya kecc"! Inna: "ad iyi Ineooi Oebbi! Ni$ bab iw ioeeb yissi. S tidep, ur rebeen imednas
S tidep, teb$a t, u neppa ib$a p, lemmer ur iwala ara atebbet n Mass is. Akka, iwakken a Nessebaad fellas tuccva, laao. Neppa, s tidep, seg imdanen nne£ izedganen
Uzzlen ar tebburt, tcerreg as tasedrit is, si zdeffir. Mmugren, argaz is, ar tebburt. Tenna: "acu ay d aqeiii n win iaabwlen ad iccmet tawacult ik, siwa leebs ne$ aaaqeb aqeoean
Inna: "d neppat iyi ib$an". Icuhhed ed yiwen unagi si twacult is: "ma teqqeos tsedrit si zdat, tenna d tidep, u neppa d akeddab
Ma teqqeos tsedrit si zdeffir, teskaddeb, u neppa seg at tidep
Mi iwala teqqeos tsedrit si zdeffir, inna: "ayagi, war ccekk, si nncub nnkwent. Ih, nncub nnkwent d timeqwoaeanin
A Yusef, ppu ayagi, u kem ssuter ssmae ubekkav im. Kem, s tidep, teccvev
La qqaoent tlawin, di temdint: "tameiiut umdebbeo teemmel acrik is. Teshebl ip tayri. F akken nwala, appan, s tidep, di ttelfan n uuee

Mi tesla s nncub nnsent, tuzen $uosent, thegga yasent tanalt. I yal yiwet segsent, tefka tafrut. Tenna: "effe$ ed garasent". Mi t walant, isdehc itent, jereent ifassen nnsent, nnant: "eaca Oebbi, wagi macci d amdan, wagi siwa d lmelk ukyis
Tenna: "d wagi i$ef iyi tlummemt. Ih, b$i$ t, neppa iqqim zeddig. Ma ur ixdim ara ay s umoe$, war ccekk, ad ipwaebes, ad ipwaeqeo
Inna: "a Mass iw! Smenyafe$ leebs i wayen u$ur iyi d ssawalent. Ma ur Tesbaadev ara felli nncub nnsent, ad male$ $uosent, ad ili$ seg wid ur nessin
Ijaweb as d Mass is. Issebaad fellas nncub nnsent. Neppa, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Sinna, mi ten usan issekniyen, ufan, war ccekk, ilaq a t irr ar leebs, kra n tallit

Kecmen yides, ar leebs, sin ilmeeiyen. Inna yiwen degsen: "nek wala$ iman iw, la teeeme$ ccoab". Inna d wayev: "nek wala$ iman iw, la ppawi$ a$oum $ef uqeoou w, la teppen segs ifrax. Ssefru ya$ p id. Ih, nwala k seg iaaoviyen
Inna: "seg wayen iyi ss$eo Mass iw, ad awen p id ssefru$, uqbel a kwen id iawev lqut i wen ppakken. Nek ooi$ ddin n ugdud ur numin s Oebbi, u nitni nekoen laxeot
Ddi$ d ddin n lejdud iw: Iboahim, Iseaq akked Yaaqub. Ur a$ ippunefk a nezdukkel acemma i Oebbi. Ayagi si lfevl n Oebbi fellane$, akw $ef imdanen. Maca, tegwti n yimdanen ur snemmiren
A yimeddukwal iw n leebs, menyif imawlan imfaoaqen, ne$ Oebbi Yiwen, Aqehhao

Ay taabdem, war Neppa, d ismawen kan i sen tefkam, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen. Ur asen d Issers ara Oebbi kra udabu. Leukm ar Oebbi kan. Iumeo ed ur taabdem, siwa Neppa. D wagi ay d ddin uuwib, maca tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
A yimeddukwal iw n leebs, wanag yiwen degwen ad ismiri ccoab, i bab is, wayev ad ippusemmeo $ef umidag, ifrax ad nneqben aqeoou s. Ippuseyya lameo $ef wayen iyi d testeqsam
Inna i win ieua ad islek, segsen: "ar bab ik, smekti iyi d". Cciian iseppu t, ur t id ismekti ar bab is. Irna, di leebs, kra iseggwasen
Inna ugellid: "nek wala$ ua testan tiqebwaniyin, la tent teppent ua tuvaifin, akked ua tyedrin tizegzawin, tiyav d tiqquoanin. A yimvebboen, ssefrut iyi d targit, ma tellam seg wid issefruyen tirga
Nnan: "d tirga iwlellsen. Ur nelli d imusnawen i usefru n tirga
Win i isellken si sin nni, armi tallit id immekti, inna: "nek, ad awen d awi$ asefru ines, aznet iyi
A Yusef, bab n tidep, ssefru ya$ d: ua testan tiqebwaniyin, la tent teppent ua tuvaifin, akked ua tyedrin tizegzawin, tiyav d tiqquoanin. Amar, ma u$ale$ ar imdanen, amar ad eoen
Inna: "zeraat ua iseggwasen imyevfaoen. Ayen tzeraam, eooet ep di tyedrin is, siwa cwii ara teccem
Sinna, deffir sen, a d asen ua iwaaoen. Ad ccen ayen i sen theggam siwa cwii, seg wayen txeznem
Sinna a d ias, deffir waya, useggwas n tallalt i medden, ideg ara eden
Inna ugellid: "awit ep id $uoi". Mi t id iusa umersul, inna: "u$al ar bab ik, u steqsi t acu ay d l$eov n tlawin i ijereen ifassen nnsent. Mass iw, s tidep, Issen nncub nnsent
Inna: "acu ara d tinimt mi teb$amt Yusef"? Nnant: "eaca Oebbi, ur nufi $uoes tuccva". Tenna d tmeiiut umvebbeo: "tura, a d tban tidep. D nek i t ib$an, ma d neppa, s tidep, d bab n tidep
Akka, iwakken ad ieeo ur t xdiaa$ ara s tuffra. Oebbi ur Inehhu nncub n lxeyyan
Ur pzekki$ iman iw. Tanefsit, s tidep, tezzu$uo ar tuccva, siwa ma Ieun Mass iw. Mass iw, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Inna ugellid: "awit ep id $uoi, d laatiq iw". Mi s immeslay, inna: "kecc, assa, nefka yak adabu, laman
Inna: "wekkel iyi $ef lemxazen n tmurt, nek d ameareb amusnaw
Akka ay Nesseqaad Yusef di tmurt, ad izde$ anda i s ihwa. Nepeunu $ef win i £ ihwan, ur Nesoueu arraz iaaoviyen
S tidep, arraz n laxeot yif it, i wid iumnen u llan peezziben
Usan watmaten n Yusef, kecmen $uoes, iaqel iten, nitni ur t aqilen
Mi sen ifka ppaabgat nnsen, inna: "awit iyi d gmat wen s babat wen. Day ur twalam ara zade$ awen lkil, u, nek, ife$ akw wid isnebgaten
Ma ur iyi t id tebbwim ara, ur awen nepktili $uoi, ur iyi d tepsamim
Nnan: "a neawet baba s fellas; akka ara nexdem
Inna i iqeddacen is: "rret selaa nnsen deg icekkaoen nnsen, amar a p aaqlen mara awven ar twacult nnsen, amar a d u$alen
Mi bbwven ar babat sen, nnan: "a babat nne$, igdel fella$ lkil, azen gmat nne$ yidne$, iwakken a d nektil. Nekwni, war ccekk, a neareb fellas
Inna: "day a kwen amne$ fellas, akken i kwen umne$, zik, $ef gma s? Oebbi Yif akw imearaben. Neppa Iphunu sennig akw ieninen

Mi ldin lqecc nnsen, ufan tu$al iten id selaa nnsen. Nnan: "a babat nne$, ur neb$i tagi, selaa nne$ tu$al a$ d. A d nessikrer i twacult nne$, a neareb $ef gmat nne$, a d nernu ppaabga n ul$wem. Tagi d ppaabga tushilt
Inna: "ur t sedduye$ yidwen, d awez$i, siwa ma tcubkem iyi s Oebbi, ard a yi t id terrem, siwa ma zzin awen". Mi s aahden, inna: "Oebbi d Awkil $ef wayen id nenna
Inna: "a tarwa, ur keccmet si yiwet n tebburt, kecmet si tebbura imgarraden. Ula i wen xedme$, bippa, ar loiha n Oebbi. Aeuddu siwa win n Oebbi. FellaS ppekle$, fellaS ay ppeklen wid ippkalen

Mi kecmen akken i sen iumeo babat sen, ula i sen ixdem, bippa, ar loiha n Oebbi. D ayen ilezmen kan i iseyya Yaqub, deg iman is. Neppa, s tidep, isaa tamusni i s Nesselmed, maca tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
Mi kecmen ar Yusef, ibbwi gma s $uoes, inna: "nekkini d gma k, ur $webbel $ef wayen xeddmen
Mi sen ifka ppaabgat nnsen, irra taqbuct deg ucekkao n gma s. Sinna, iberree uberrae: "a yat terkaf, kunwi, war ccekk, d imakwaren
Nnan, u zzin $uosen: "d acu tesoueem
Nnan: "nesoue taqbuct ugellid. Win ip id ibbwin, ad as nefk ppaabga n ul$wem. Nek, vemne$ t
Nnan: "s Oebbi, nni$ teeoam ur d nusa ara a nessefsed tamurt, ur nelli d imakwaren
Nnan: "d acu ay d aqeiii s, ma teskadbem
Nnan: " aqeiii n win i p ibbwin di tcekkaot is, d yiman is. Akka ay nepkafi imednas

Ibda la ipqellib icekkaoen, uqbel win n gma s, sinna, issuffe$ ip id seg ucekkao n gma s. Akka ay Nefka ticeokep i Yusef. Ur izmir ad iiief gma s, s lqanun ugellid, siwa ma Irad Oebbi. Nessalay, tiseddaoin, win i £ihwan. Sennig bu tussna, illa Umusnaw
Nnan: "ma iuker, ni$ iuker, zik, yiwen n watma s". Iffer ip Yusef $uoes, ur asen p id inna ara. Inna: "aql akwen deg yir eala. Oebbi Yif akw akken Ieoa ayen d teqqaoem
Nnan: "a yameqwoan, baba s, s tidep, wesser. Eiief yiwen segne$ deg umekkan is. Nwala k, ih, telliv si lauuam
Inna: "ur a$ Iaammed Oebbi a neiief, siwa win u$uo nufa ta$awsa nne$. Mulac, war ccekk, a nili d imednas

Mi uysen segs, mcawaoen, inna umeqwoan segsen: "day ur teeoim ara, ar babat wen tcubkem t s Oebbi, u, zik, tveggaam Yusef? Ihi, ur poueu$ si tmurt a, d awez$i, alamma iserree iyi baba, ne$ Ifra Oebbi felli. Neppa, Yif akw imeaddan
U$alet ar babat wen, tinem as: a babat nne$, mmi k, s tidep, iuker. Ncehhed kan $ef wayen neeoa, ur nessawev i tbavnit
Steqsi tamdint ideg i nella, akked terkift ukud nedda. Ih, d tidep, ay d nenna
Inna: "xaii! Lameo seg iman nnwen. Ilha uubeo. Amar Oebbi a yi ten id Iawi akw. Neppa, s tidep, d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ijuneb iten, u inna: "a leif iw $ef Yusef"! Allen is ijegger itent u$ilif, innu$ben
Nnan: "s Oebbi, tezgiv tesmektayev d Yusef, alamma tu$alev d amuvin, ne$ seg wid immuten
Inna: "la pcetki$ kan i Oebbi, s uneemi w akked u$wbel iw. Ssne$, s$uo Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
A yarraw iw, oueet, steqsit $ef Yusef akked gma s. Ur ppayset di tecvai n Oebbi. Ih, i ippaysen di tecvai n Oebbi, siwa agdud ijehliyen
Mi bbwven $uoes, nnan as: "a yameqwoan, nekwni akked twacult nne$, nepwa$. Nusa d s selaa oxisen, semd as lkil, seddeq a$. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipkafi wid ipseddiqen
Inna: "teeoam i tgam i Yusef akked gma s, mi kunwi, d wid ur nessin
Nnan: "kecc, s tidep, macci d Yusef "? Inna: "nek d Yusef, atan gma. Ni$ I$at a$ Oebbi. Ih, wid ipeezziben, wid iuebboen ... Oebbi, s tidep, ur Isoueu arraz iaaoviyen
Nnan: "s Oebbi ar k Ismenyaf Oebbi garane$. Nekwni, s tidep, neccev
Inna: "ur telli tiyta degwen, assa. Ad awen Isemmee Oebbi! Neppa Yif akw wid ipeunun
Awit tasedrit iw agi, erret ep $ef udem n baba, ad ielu yieoi s. Aset ed $uoi, s twacult nnwen, meooa
Mi teqlaa terkift, babat sen ibda la iqqao: "nek, s tidep, sraee$ rriea n Yusef, awi d kan ur teqqaoem ara: la isxeowiv
Nnan: "s Oebbi, ar k mazal di ttelfan ik n zik
Mi d iusa ubcir, issers as p $ef udem is, llint ed wallen is, inna: "day ur awen nni$ ara: nek ssne$, s$uo Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Nnan as: "a babat nne$, ssuter ad a$ pwasemmeen ibekkaven nne$. S tidep, nella d imednab
Inna: "deqqal ad ssutre$, i Mass iw, ad awen Isemmee. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Mi bbwven ar Yusef, isteoeeb s imawlan is. Inna: "kecmet ar Maseo, di laman, ma Irad Oebbi

Issuli imawlan is ar usgeld. £lin, knan as. Inna: "a baba! D wagi ay d asefru n targit iw, n zik. Ni$ Issuffe$ ip Mass iw! Ni$ Iga yi leqoao mi yi d Issuffe$ si leebs. Ikkes ikwen id si sseeoa, deffir tismin i isker Cciian, gari d watma. Mass iw, s tidep, d Laiif i win i S ihwan. Ih, Neppa d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
A Mass iw, ni$ Tefkiv iyi si tgelda, Teseefvev iyi asefru n temsal. Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, Kecc, d Bab iw di ddunit, di laxeot, Eddem ooue iw d amvua, Ssiwev iyi ar wid imaanen
Tagi, si teekayin n tbavnit, Nweeea yak p in. Ur telliv $uosen, mi mwafaqen a p andin
Tegwti n yimdanen, xas taapbev, ur ppamnen
Ur asen ssutur kra n teqdiat. Neppa, d asmekti kan i imavalen
I illan deg issekniyen di tmurt akked igenwan! La teddun fellasen, maca wexxoen asen
Tegwti, segsen, ur ppamnen s Oebbi, siwa ma curken
Day ppeklen ur asen isburru yara uaaqeb n Oebbi, ne$ ur ten id ippas ara yimir, deqzalla, ur pfaqan
Ini: "wagi d abrid iw, la pnuju$ ar Oebbi ad Ildi allen, i nek akked wid iddan yidi. Gedha s Oebbi! Ur lli$ seg wid ipcaraken

Nuzen ed kan, uqbel ik, irgazen seg imezda$ n temdinin, iwumi Nweeea. Day ur unagen ara di tmurt, ad walin amek tevoa d wid i ten id izwaren? Ih, pifxio axxam aneggaru i wid ipeezziben. Day ur tefhimem ara
Alamma, mi uysen imazanen, u meyyzen ar skaddben ten, tusa ten id tallalt s$uone£. Nepsellik win i £ ihwan. Ur ipwakkas ara ssxev nne£, i ugdud ibe$wviyen
Ni$, di teekayin nnsen, illa uselmed i yuaqilen. Ur telli d awal id innulfan. Neppat tetebbet ed ay d izwaren, tfeuuel ed yal cci. D nnhaya u d aeunu i ugdud iumnen
